- `snapshot_id` (string) - The instance needs to create a snapshot ID of the image, which must contain a system disk snapshot ID
  Can be default: Yes, this parameter cannot be default when creating image based on snapshot

- `data_disk_id` (string) - The ID of the data disk that the instance needs to mirror
  Default: Yes
